title: Arbitrum Stylus Workshop
description:
Join us for an immersive hands-on workshop exploring Arbitrum Stylus, the revolutionary WebAssembly VM that enables developers to write smart contracts in Rust, C, and C++.

Learn how to **optimize gas costs** and leverage existing codebases in the Arbitrum ecosystem.

title: DeFi Integration Summit
description: A comprehensive two-day summit focused on **DeFi protocol integration** and cross-chain interoperability. Network with leading builders and investors while exploring the future of decentralized finance.

title: Zero Knowledge Hackathon
description: Build privacy-preserving applications using **zero-knowledge proofs** and contribute to the next generation of Web3 infrastructure. $50,000 in prizes for the most innovative solutions.

title: Open Web Tour Hackathon
description: A global, six-week hackathon series spanning three continents to fuel the *future of blockchain technology*. Build **transformative decentralized applications** with mentorship from core protocol developers and compete for a $250,000 prize pool.
